spec_data.Name: perl-Test-YAML-Meta
spec_data.Description:
This module was written to ensure that a META.yml file, provided with a
standard distribution uploaded to CPAN, meets the specifications that are
slowly being introduced to module uploads, via the use of
ExtUtils::MakeMaker, Module::Build and Module::Install.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 05:14:11 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Validation of the META.yml file in a distribution
